name: Hello Hello
body:
#### Looking for a RailsConf talk? Check [thomasmeeks.com/controversy](http://thomasmeeks.com/controversy)

#### Care to converse? Try [thomas@thomasmeeks.com](mailto:thomas@thomasmeeks.com)

#### Prefer Twitter? There's always [@thomasmeeks](http://www.twitter.com/thomasmeeks)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
